Ad Text:
At Mindsprint we are looking for a highly accomplished Software Engineer - Data Solution Architect with over 10 years of hands-on experience in designing, implementing, and optimising scalable data solutions across diverse industries to join our team. Adept at leveraging the latest cloud technologies, with deep expertise in modern data platforms such as Databricks and Snowflake, as well as a wide range of Business Intelligence (BI) tools. Proven ability to translate complex business requirements into robust, secure, and high-performing data architectures that drive actionable insights and business value.

Mindsprint located in Sydney, is looking for a Software Engineer - Data Solution Architect to work on projects for its customers based out of Brisbane.

Role expectations and experience

·      Architected and led end-to-end delivery of cloud-native data platforms using Databricks and Snowflake, enabling enterprise-scale analytics and reporting capabilities.

·      Designed and implemented modern ETL/ELT pipelines, integrating data from multiple sources to cloud environments for advanced analytics and machine learning workloads.

·      Developed data governance frameworks ensuring data quality, lineage, and security across global organisations.

·      Provided technical leadership and mentorship to teams, fostering best practices in data engineering and analytics.

·      Collaborated with business stakeholders to understand strategic objectives and deliver actionable insights through custom BI dashboards and visualisations.

Core Competencies

·      Cloud Data Platform Architecture (Azure, AWS, GCP)

·      Design and Implementation of Data Lakehouses and Data Warehouses

·      Expertise in Databricks (Spark, MLflow, Delta Lake)

·      Advanced Snowflake Data Engineering and Administration

·      Data Modelling, ETL/ELT Pipeline Development, and Data Integration

·      Mastery of BI Tools (Power BI, Tableau, Looker, QlikView)

·      Data Governance, Security, and Compliance

·      Big Data Analytics and Real-time Data Processing

·      Stakeholder Engagement and Technical Leadership

·      Agile Project Delivery and Cross-functional Team Collaboration

Compentation Range - 140K to 160K AUD inclusive of applicable Superannuation

Commencement Date - 15-Jan-2026

About Mindsprint

At Mindsprint, we exist to responsibly engineer the next generation of enterprises driven by insight, innovation, and passion. With a global workforce of over 3,400 professionals across the US, UK, India, Australia, Africa, and the Middle East, we are recognized as a Great Place to Work Certified™ company. Headquartered in Singapore, we partner with leading organizations worldwide to deliver AI-driven, cloud-native, and data-powered solutions that transform industries such as retail, agriculture, manufacturing, healthcare, and life sciences.

Joining Mindsprint means being part of a culture of collaboration, creativity, and impact, where you’ll work on cutting-edge technologies like Databricks, Snowflake, Generative AI, Cybersecurity, and Business Process Automation. We empower our people to innovate, grow, and shape the future of digital transformation while making a meaningful difference in sustainability, supply chain optimization, and customer experience.

The difference starts here, come sprint with us to build smarter, more resilient enterprises.
